title: 60C.10 EVALUATION OF CLAIMS.
text:
The board shall determine whether claims submitted for payment are covered claims.
[Repealed, 1981 c 260 s 4]
If the board finds that a claim for which the claimant has requested payment out of the fund is not a covered claim or the board reduces the amount of or rejects the claim, the board shall notify the claimant in writing of the rights the claimant has under section 60C.12.
